name: CPTemplateApplicationDashboardScene
desc: A CarPlay scene that controls your app’s dashboard navigation window.

items.name: var delegate: CPTemplateApplicationDashboardSceneDelegate?
items.desc: The object that receives the dashboard scene’s life-cycle events.

items.name: protocol CPTemplateApplicationDashboardSceneDelegate
items.desc: The methods for responding to the life-cycle events of your navigation app’s dashboard scene.

items.name: var dashboardController: CPDashboardController
items.desc: The controller that manages the dashboard scene’s shortcut buttons.

items.name: class CPDashboardController
items.desc: A controller that provides shortcut buttons for the CarPlay Dashboard.

items.name: var dashboardWindow: UIWindow
items.desc: The window that belongs to the dashboard scene.
